modName: IPM - Insane Armory - Archery Bows and Crossbows
summary:
Insane Armory - Archery Bows and Crossbows changing thickness/size of bows and crossbows by 25~50 percent.
Support: Perkus Maximus, Skyrim Redone, Longbows, and more coming.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50737-1-1418472603.png[/img]
[color=#005502][size=5][b]Insane Armory - Archery Bows and Crossbows[/b][/size][/color]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50737-1-1418472603.png[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/z3Ekb1U.gif[/img]

[color=#FF9900][size=4][b]Description[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#FF9900][size=3][b]This modification will no longer be updated.
Only version for Skyrim Special Edytion will be developed further.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2025/?]Skyrim Special Edition Version[/url][/b][/size][/color][b]

[b]This would not be possible without [url=http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/4136-nifskope-20-dev/]NifSkope[/url] and [url=https://github.com/figment/max_nif_plugin/releases]3ds Max Nif Plugin[/url][/b].

Modification changing thickness of bows and crossbows by 25~50 percent.
(depending on the options selected during installation)

Does not contain any plugin (ESP, ESM) replaces only meshes (NIF) files.
Is compatible with any modification which edits bows and replaces textures
[color=#ff0000][u]but does not change meshes.[/u][/color]

I play Skyrim using first-person view 90 percent of time.
In skyrim there is no possibility of effectively shooting and hitting
target other than view from first person.(personal opinion)
[size=3][color=#ff0000][b][u]And just for view from first-person I created this modification.[/u][/b][/color][/size]

[color=#FF9900][size=4][b]Install[/b][/size][/color]

It can be installed and uninstalled with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?]Wrye Bash[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] at any time without any complications.
(WB and NMM after uninstalling restores previously replaced files)

[color=#336600][b]I tried to do everything as best I can.
If you notice any mistakes, errors please let me know.
Comments, suggestions, pictures, any feedback etc... greatly appreciated.[/b][/color]

[color=#FF9900][size=4][b]Recommended complementary modifications[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30282/?]Scoia'tael Bows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66379/?]Insane Armory - Axes Hammers Maces[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67828/?]Insane Armory - Shields[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39870/?]Better Shaped Weapons - BSW by LeanWolf and masterofshadow[/url]
[size=2][b][color=#FF9900](This modifications inspired me to create Insane Archery)[/color][/b][/size]

[color=#FF9900][size=4][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]

[b][url=http://bethsoft.com/en-gb]Bethesda[/url] for creating games that can be modified.
[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifSkope[/url]
[url=https://github.com/figment/max_nif_plugin/releases]3ds Max Nif Plugin[/url]
[url=http://www.autodesk.com/]3DMAX 2012[/url]
[url=http://notepad-plus-plus.org/]Notepad++[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2811323/?]jet4571 for help.[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3253170/?]Trueno33 for finding and reporting bug that caused disappearance of bows after dropping them.[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/?]Team and community nexusmods.com[/url][/b]

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50737-1-1418472603.png[/img]

[size=3][color=#c80000][b]You CAN NOT use anything from My modification on website that makes money directly or through advertising.
>>> The only exception is www.nexusmods.com <<<
You CAN NOT use anything from My modification on Steam Workshop or Bethesda.net.[/b][/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#006400][b]In other cases for permission ask via PM.[/color][/size][/b][/center]
author: InsanePlumber

files.name: Insane Longbows Sizes for Skyrim Redone
files.fileName: More Realistic Longbows Sizes for Skyrim Redone-50737-1-2.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Version 1.2 (NOT SUPPORTED)
Fixed
- Bug that caused the disappearance of bows after dropping them to the ground.
(Thank you Trueno33 for finding and reporting this bug)
Now you can smash bows on the ground ;-)

Added
- New patch for Skyrim Redone by T3nd0.
(Thank you Grantiz for permission to use his meshes.)
- Downguard Crossbows thickness slimmed down by 50%.
(There is a slight issue, with the Dwarven Crossbow bolt clips into the crossbow.
This does not mean that I'll leave it alone, just at the moment I can not solve this problem.)

files.name: IPM - Insane Archery - Dawnguard
files.fileName: IPM - Insane Bows and Crossbow Sizes Dawnguard-50737-.7z
files.changelogHtml:
All bows and crossbows (except listed below) have been edited in 3DS MAX 2012 Which allowed for the preservation of original size of the handle.

All bowstring reduced by 50% in both 25% and 50% version.

Renaming a modification with More Realistic Bows and Crossbows Sizes to Insane Bows and Crossbows Sizes.
No one will accuse me that they are unrealistic. (from now are just insane)

Daedric Bow is the best bow in the game and is a mess!
I note as it is moved relative to the other bows in the hand when shooting from a first-person view.
For a while there I solve this issue, it will not be included in the modification.
Also, I came across a issue with editing Vertex Colors. (flashing red glow)

Bound Bows
Just I did not have time to finish.

As soon as I'm done with these problems, both bows will be added.

files.name: IPM - Insane Archery - Dragonborn
